Data Structures

class  Example_sensor

Detailed Description

This example shows how ApMon can be used for collecting system monitoring information.

The program acts like a simple sensor, which only sends system monitoring datagrams in the background thread. The time interval at which the datagrams are sent can be set from the destinations_s.conf file.
